Alright, I've been "test infected" for a little while now and I'm
writing my tests before writing any implementation logic. Now I need
to modify some existing EJBs which have not yet been touched with the
test infection. Where do I start? We are nearing our beta date and we
cannot afford any major upsets in the existing code base. I feel like
I cannot continue my current project until I write a test of some sort
for this session bean. I don't want to have to write an integration
test first. I've been hearing that cactus is the thing for me but I
cannot get a good mental picture of how to start with it or how it
works. If I use Cactus does that mean that I have to deploy my entire
app before testing the EJB? Please help.

Cliff
